### ggplot News
```{r}
library(tidyverse)
```


####  Legend position
```{r}
mpg %>% 
  ggplot(aes(displ,hwy, colour = manufacturer)) +
  geom_point()
```
```{r}
mpg %>% 
  ggplot(aes(displ,hwy, colour = manufacturer)) +
  geom_point() +
  theme(legend.position = "bottom")
```
#### Labels
```{r}
mpg %>% 
  ggplot(aes(displ,hwy, colour = manufacturer)) +
  geom_point() +
  labs(title = "Main title", subtitle ="Very long subtitle!", caption = "data from ...")
```


#### Facets
```{r}
mtcars %>% 
  mutate(
    Logarithmic = log(mpg),
    Inverse = 1 / mpg,
    Cubic = mpg ^ 3,
    Original = mpg) %>%
  gather(transformation, mpg2, Logarithmic:Original) ->
  df

df %>% 
  ggplot(aes(mpg2, disp)) +
  geom_point() +
  facet_wrap(~transformation)
```
```{r}
df %>% 
  ggplot(aes(mpg2, disp)) +
  geom_point() +
  facet_wrap(~transformation, scales = "free")
```
